question:
Which of the following is / are members of the National Integration Council (NIC)?
  1. Union Ministers
  2. Governors of all States
  3. Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha
  4. Chief Minister of all States & UT's with Legislature
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: National Integration Council set up in early 1960s by Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru, the NIC held its first meeting in 1962. Currently chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The NIC Members include Union Ministers, leaders of Opposition in the Lok Sabha and the Rajya Sabha, Chief Ministers of all the States and Union Territories with Legislature.
